title: JOi Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out
description: A 100% vegan/organic/gluten free wholefoods cafe opened Sept 2014. Offers breakfast, lunch, dinner, and a grab 'n go section. Has an eclectic menu which includes smoothies, burgers, entrees, salads. Previously bee pollen was in a few items, but has been completely vegan since Oct 2014. Enter the shopping center on Village Glen. You can pre-order, pre-pay and pick-up.
